title: What does it take for pes girl to date an outside guy??
content:
I live in a pg in the gully behind less and am not a student. I work in bosch as a mechanical engineer would love to take a good looking girl out for a date!?? 

Reason: Need a work life balance.

comments.body: Fuck dating broski, come to gym. Lets get those curves sorted.
that's different, man!! I'm just looking for fun, lol. Bored of worklife
